inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Javelin', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Short Spear', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Long Spear', 'Damage', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Advanced Training, Spears
description: You gain an additional +15 to damage with javelins, short spears, and long spears.
